Articles.Content:
EDIT: I see the terrain still hasn't been fixed... such a shame. I'll have to go somewhere else.

EDIT: Ah, Moho! Of course. Intros, hi wassup, all the good stuff, let's get into it.

I've started circumnavigation on Moho, and that was a good idea. I even got an armed rover making circles. I'll update once every 11 images. Here's the first.

**To note:** There may be a few inconsistencies during the challenge. I have a few issues with the way the clock works in the game because of how I do not use your standard time measurements.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/3sRpZ)

UPDATE: Very uninteresting right now, but I did promise a report, so here it is.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/0kDyp)

UPDATE: Slow but steady work. I decided to give myself a day, but back to work. Almost halfway through the trip, though!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/B5aMH)

UPDATE: Extremely slow work... But, we have crossed the halfway point, and can possibly finish in another cycle.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/4iHW9)

UPDATE: Almost done! I've been deceived by the terrain, but it isn't anything too serious.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/HAZav)

UPDATE: Complete! The NaNo virus tried to ruin my night, but in the end we still got back to the beacon.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/8fGcl)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T08:55:00Z" title="05/26/2015 08:55  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**
Lookin' good so far! I mean, I assume so... Once I get home I'll check out your images!
It's extremely slow work right now. I might not update even for another day. Maybe I should change my schedules...
My Kerbin circumnavigation is going really really slowly as well... Be wary of glitches! Save often, unlike me!
Congratulations on finishing this journey! I hope you found something enlightening along the way ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).
Congratulations, Xannari! Get your name in that history book!
Thank you all! But before we go, a word from our sponsors...
